bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text:
Hi Max,

many thanks for the patch. I have committed it your patch in revision 1095076. Although I noticed in testing that page citations that reference IDs on page-sequence don't work. This is unrelated to your changes as I confirmed this is also the case when using page-number-citation. Therefore this particular bug is now closed.

Thanks,

Chris
